title: Making/Receiving Calls Crashes Pixel
content:
As many of you, Since april 2019 Pie's update my Pixel started crashing as I received phone calls forcing me to reboot it. Same happened while trying to make phone calls too.

Another funny symptoms:
- Whatsapp calls don't work
- Whatsapp audios won't play
- Audiojack stopped working
- Mic works randomly
- System IU crash messages appear from time to time

What has already been tried:
- Rebooting in safe mode doesn't work
- Reset the device to factory settings (though I reinstalled my apps, contacts and everything back from my Google Backup account, instead of going one by one)
- Uninstalled Digital Wellbeing updates (cleaned cache, data, and forced to stop)
- Uninstalled Phone App updates (cleaned cache, data, and Reinstalled it)

Today (5/6/19) latest security update has been installed, yet everything's still much the same.

What I have left to try:
- Downgrading to Oreo
- Upgrading to Q? (better not I guess)

What I can't do:
- Take it to any store or mail it to Google: since I live in Argentina, I don't have any hard support down here...

Any help is truly appreciated. Cheers.
